snippet: The Sedition Act, a British colonial-era law, is being used to charge and investigate politicians, activists, academics and students. But a law professor is challenging its constitutionality.
lead_paragraph: The Sedition Act, a British colonial-era law, is being used to charge and investigate politicians, activists, academics and students. But a law professor is challenging its constitutionality.

headline.main: In Malaysia, Activists Draw Attention to Colonial-Era Sedition Act
